attributes.action: Stop letting more migrants in to the uk.
attributes.background:
Please stop letting more migrants in as we are over stretched with the NHS
We dont have anothe jobs for everyone in the uk as it is.
We need to home our own people before others from other countries

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106477

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
